dependencies.name: MinVerjIoServer
dependencies.description: The minimised version of the verjio server. May be used by all internal servers that require a verj.io server.

dependencies.name: FullVerjIoServer
dependencies.description: The full version of the verjio server. Used by some customer-facing server that use a verj.io server. Contains things like reference documentation.

dependencies.name: ControllerVerjIoServer
dependencies.description: The minimised version of the verjio server for use by the controller container (docker mandates that it must be part of the image filesystem).

dependencies.name: WebAppVerjIoServer
dependencies.description: The minimised version of the verjio server for use by the webapp container (docker mandates that it must be part of the image filesystem).

dependencies.name: ServicePlans-Paas-Jar
dependencies.description: The paas jar is an extension to Verj.io On Premises that adds features uses in the cloud. This is added to every service plan via the paas-jar container.

dependencies.name: CloudPortal-Paas-Jar
dependencies.description: The paas jar for all the customer portal

dependencies.name: AdminPortal-Paas-Jar
dependencies.description: The paas jar for all the customer portal

dependencies.name: Hub-Paas-Jar
dependencies.description: The paas jar for all the customer portal

dependencies.name: Enactor-Paas-Jar
dependencies.description: The paas jar for all the customer portal

dependencies.name: Oracle18-4_InitialDB
dependencies.description: Oracle 18.4 container: A zip of the initial oracle database users get when they add oracle to their service plan. Its a huge size for something thats essentially an empty database.

dependencies.name: Oracle18-4_BackupDB
dependencies.description: Oracle 18.4 container: A zip of the backup oracle database users get when they add oracle to their service plan. Its a huge size for something thats essentially an empty database.

dependencies.name: Oracle18-4_JDCBDriver
dependencies.description: Oracle 18.4 container: The oracle jdbc driver that is added to the webapps when they select an oracle database. Licensing restrictions means that it can't be included by default.

dependencies.name: SqlServer2022_InitialDB
dependencies.description: SqlServer container: A zip of the initial sqlserver database users get when they add sqlserver 2022 to their service plan.

dependencies.name: Maria_10-2_InitialDB
dependencies.description: Maris 10.2 container: A zip of the initial maria database users get when they add maria 10.2 to their service plan.

dependencies.name: WebApp_Log4J
dependencies.description: Webapp container: requires several libraries to get going. Possibly can be done in the image file (which would be better)

dependencies.name: WebApp_Log4JWebApp
dependencies.description: Webapp container: requires several libraries to get going. Possibly can be done in the image file (which would be better)
